name: Don't Get Whacked
description:
A little gameboy studio game where you play as a funny dragon man who doesn't want to get whacked by a big mean crocodile guy. Select a hole to hide in with left/right and then press A or Start to confirm (Z or Enter on keyboards). Afterwards you'll see if the dragon was safe or not.

The game is entirely luck based! So don't worry too much about winning or losing. I made this to test out different parts of the GB Studio engine as a sort of warm-up, ha ha.
